name: Igloohome Smart Lock
description: Igloohome Smart Lock offers keyless entry with a PIN code or Bluetooth. It includes features such as remote access control, automatic locking, and an easy installation process.

review.comment: Convenient and secure with easy installation.

customerReviews.name: Emma Johnson
customerReviews.comment: Fantastic smart lock with easy setup and reliable performance.

customerReviews.name: Oliver Brown
customerReviews.comment: Great lock but sometimes the Bluetooth connection is slow.

name: Igloohome Keybox
description: The Igloohome Keybox provides secure storage for physical keys. It features a PIN code entry, weather-resistant design, and is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.

review.comment: Reliable key storage with secure PIN code access.

customerReviews.name: Sophia Lee
customerReviews.comment: Excellent keybox with easy PIN entry and durable design.

customerReviews.name: Liam Davis
customerReviews.comment: Good keybox but could be more compact.

name: Igloohome Smart Padlock
description: The Igloohome Smart Padlock features a keyless design with Bluetooth access. It includes a rechargeable battery, weather-resistant build, and can be managed via a mobile app.

review.comment: Convenient and sturdy padlock with excellent features.

customerReviews.name: Noah Wilson
customerReviews.comment: Great padlock with reliable Bluetooth connectivity and sturdy build.

customerReviews.name: Ava Martinez
customerReviews.comment: Effective padlock but the app could use some improvements.

name: Igloohome Smart Doorbell
description: The Igloohome Smart Doorbell offers video and audio communication with visitors via a mobile app. It includes motion detection, night vision, and integration with other Igloohome products.

review.comment: Excellent smart doorbell with clear video and useful features.

customerReviews.name: Isabella Thompson
customerReviews.comment: Fantastic doorbell with great video quality and features.

customerReviews.name: Ethan White
customerReviews.comment: Good doorbell but the night vision could be better.

name: Igloohome Smart Safe
description: The Igloohome Smart Safe provides secure storage with a keyless locking system. It features remote access control, a built-in alarm, and a robust design for maximum security.

review.comment: Highly secure with excellent features and remote access.

customerReviews.name: Mia Harris
customerReviews.comment: Excellent safe with top-notch security and remote features.

customerReviews.name: Lucas Taylor
customerReviews.comment: Great safe but a bit bulky.

name: Igloohome Smart Sensor
description: The Igloohome Smart Sensor provides monitoring for doors and windows. It offers real-time notifications, easy installation, and integration with other Igloohome devices.

review.comment: Useful sensor with good integration and real-time alerts.

customerReviews.name: James Anderson
customerReviews.comment: Great sensor with reliable notifications and easy setup.

customerReviews.name: Olivia Walker
customerReviews.comment: Effective sensor but the app could be more user-friendly.
